mapper.select: select deal_no, contents, reg_date from review where deal_no = #{ dealNo }
select r.deal_no, contents, r.reg_date, d.buyer from review r INNER JOIN deal d on d.deal_no = r.deal_no where d.product_no = ${productNo}
select r.deal_no, r.contents, r.reg_date, d.buyer, d.product_no from review r INNER JOIN deal d on d.deal_no = r.deal_no where d.buyer = #{id}
select r.deal_no, r.contents, r.reg_date, d.buyer, d.product_no, p.name from review r, deal d, product p where r.deal_no = d.deal_no and d.product_no = p.product_no and p.seller = #{id}
select r.deal_no, r.contents, r.reg_date, d.buyer, d.product_no, m.img_file_name from review r, deal d, member m where r.deal_no = d.deal_no and d.buyer = m.id and d.buyer = #{id}
